name: Healthy Site SEO
author: TheOnlineHero - Tom Skroza

sections.description:
A wordpress plugin that recommends which plugins to install to optimize and secure your site. It also recommends plugins/website links that can help boost your overall SEO score.

Built by The Marketing Mix Perth: https://www.marketingmix.com.au
sections.installation:
1) Install WordPress 5.5 or higher

2) Download the latest from:

https://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/healthy-site-seo

3) Login to WordPress admin, click on Plugins / Add New / Upload, then upload the zip file you just downloaded.

4) Activate the plugin.

Built by The Marketing Mix Perth: http://www.marketingmix.com.au

1.3

  • Renamed Better WP Security to iThemes Security

1.2

  • Removed Tom M8te – WordPress rejected and removed the plugin because its a framework plugin and they are no longer allowed on the WordPress Plugin Network.

1.1

  • Setup default options for Revision Control and permalinks.

1.0

  • Initial Commit
